channel.title: Help Needed | How to change what the npc says + server name!
channel.description:
I have a problem , in my server , in home , there are a few [b][u]NPCs[/u][/b] that say things about the server with the old name and I wanted to ask : HOW AND WHERE DO I CHANGE WHAT THE NPC SAY?????
Another question: when I run the client it says (on top of everything) "servername" version "x" powered by "y" , how do I change that text?
THANKS FOR ALL WHO HELPS!

item.title: Help Needed | How to change what the npc says + server name!
item.dc:creator: @RedTapuah RedTapuah
item.description:
@RedTapuah wrote:

Never mind thats to complicated for me…
Please comment in the new topic i’ve posted named : A few more questions!

Mods if you want , you can lock / delete this topic.

Read full topic

@11167 wrote:

Find the interface ID, and you’ll know the line. (That’s an assumption on your part)

item.title: Help Needed | How to change what the npc says + server name!
item.description:
@11167 wrote:

xxDiluted2xx:

Either way, your runserver.bat must be off when you compile. Rerun the client if it didn’t work. It should work then.

You can compile something while it’s running. You can save while it’s running, so you can compile too.

[quote=“RedTapuah, post:15, topic:284838”]I TOLD U ALERADY , IT DOESNT APPEAR ANYWHERE!!!

PLEASE HELP![/quote]

The words have to be somewhere, otherwise they wouldn’t be anywhere.

Read full topic

item.title: Help Needed | How to change what the npc says + server name!
item.dc:creator: @xxDiluted2xx xxDiluted2xx
item.description:
@xxDiluted2xx wrote:

If your changing an npc’s text, go in the ‘Npchandler.java’ file. And search for what the npc says.
If your wondering why it is saying Homiescape on the side, just search in the GUI or EGUI? Is it the client, or the source. Either way, your runserver.bat must be off when you compile. Rerun the client if it didn’t work. It should work then.

Read full topic
item.source: Help Needed | How to change what the npc says + server name!

@11167 wrote:

Search @whi@h or @whi@ h
It’ll be either in the texthandler, or the client.java, unlessed Homie came out with a client and you’re using it.

item.title: Help Needed | How to change what the npc says + server name!
item.dc:creator: @Owner_Nader Owner Nader
item.description:
@Owner_Nader wrote:

Goto Npchandler.java And search for the text npc saying and change it to this text you want,

And for the client, goto gui.java & client.java and search for the client title and change it to yours, Example if the cllient name was Naderpkz then search for naderpkz and change it to the text you want it to, & compile

Read full topic
